result.arabic_text: فَلَمَّا رَءَا قَمِيصَهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ مِن كَيۡدِكُنَّۖ إِنَّ كَيۡدَكُنَّ عَظِيمٞ
result.translation: Umugabo wa wa mugore, amaze kubona ko ikanzu ya Yusufu yatabutse mu mugongo, yaciye amenya ko Yusufu ata kimwagira, maze aca abwira umugore wiwe ati: “Icabaye, ni uko washatse kumutega umutego, mu vy’ukuri mwebwe abagore imitego yanyu irahambaye”.
